meanings.definition: A tropical American plant of the gesneriad family, cultivated for its colorful flowers.
meanings.sent1: The episcia in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new episcia for my house to add color.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the episcia's petals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as an episcia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red episcia stood out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the episcia belongs.
meanings.sent1: The episcia genus includes many colorful plants.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the characteristics of the episcia genus.
meanings.sent3: The episcia genus had a family reunion in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent4: The episcia genus is like a diverse community of plants.
meanings.sent5: Each plant in the episcia genus has its unique charm.
